page.title: 14A Day in the Life...a Mum
page.content:
When Paul gets home,he gets changed and goes out to play.About half an hour later Andrew comes in from school.He also gets changed and goes out to play.I start to make the tea ready for when my husband comes in from work at about five o'clock.After tea I wash up and tidy up and get in the washing. At quarter past seven,Paul has a shower and gets ready for bed.He has a biscuit for supper,then goes to bed. Andrew has a shower at half past eight and then has some supper.He is normally in bed for nine o'clock.Then my husband and I relax and watch television until we go to bed at about half past eleven.
Mrs Glynis Dobson
